shows.title: Banker's Downfall / Extraordinary Healing
shows.first_half: Former banker Shaun Hayes discussed his dramatic rise and fall, selling his company for $500 million and then serving 8 years in prison. Followed by paranormal investigator Chris Fleming on his battle with leukemia and the role of spiritual intervention in his recovery.

shows.title: Forbidden Archaeology / Remote Viewing Techniques
shows.first_half: First Half: Michael Cremo, also known as the ‘Forbidden Archeologist,’ will report on discoveries in Montana of a new species of dome-headed dinosaurs that existed 75 million years ago. He'll also discuss archaeological discoveries that indicate a modern human presence dating back to the same time period or even earlier.
shows.second_half: Second Half: Remote viewer Michelle Freed will speak about the future of remote viewing and its evolution beyond traditional protocols. From body sensing and psychic perception to consciousness and energy awareness, she reveals how the practice is becoming a bridge between science, intuition, and spirituality.

shows.title: Gemstone Therapy / Open Lines
shows.first_half: Holistic wellness practitioner, clinical hypnotherapist, and gemstone therapist Sydney Songer joins Connie Willis (info) to discuss gemstone energy and why it resonates with the human body, as well as how gemstones can serve as excellent energy medicinal tools. Followed by Open Lines in the latter half. Give Connie a call and discuss whatever is on your mind!
